contents.text: Welcome to Namely in San Francisco, where we empower HR teams to transform company culture through data-driven decisions.
For information on our HR software solutions, press 1.
To schedule a personalized product demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo scheduling team.

navigationGoals: I need to book a personalized demo of the HR platform.
I want to schedule a personalized demo of your HR software for my veteran services team.
Schedule a hands-on demo focusing on integrating Namely’s HR analytics API with our data warehouse.
Hello, I’d like to schedule a demo of your HR software, please.
I'd like to schedule a personalized demo highlighting the data visualization features.

contents.text: For pricing details and benefits package options, press 2.
One moment please while we connect you to our pricing specialists.

navigationGoals: I want to review pricing tiers and benefits options for our HR software.
I need detailed pricing and benefits package information to budget for HR tools in our veteran nonprofit.
Obtain a detailed price estimate for enterprise user licences plus the benefits administration module.
Could you tell me the pricing and benefit package options for your HR system?
Could you send me detailed pricing for a 50-user subscription including benefits administration?

contents.text: For customer support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we route your call to technical support.

navigationGoals: I'm experiencing a technical problem with the software and need support.
I'm having technical issues accessing my account and need help troubleshooting.
Troubleshoot an OAuth token expiration error when syncing employee records via your API.
I’m having trouble with the software and need technical assistance.
I'm encountering an API authentication error when uploading payroll data and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, and subscription management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a question about billing, invoices, or my subscription.
I need to update my billing details and review my subscription invoice for our HR software.
Update our corporate payment method and download the latest quarterly invoice for reconciliation.
I need help understanding my invoice and managing my subscription.
I need to update my billing information and download my last two invoices.
